cat.name: Success
cat.aff: I am living a life of my own design
I make definite decisions and take action on them immediately
I follow my highest dreams by taking action on realistic, actionable plans
I am driven by my deepest life purpose
I am 100% in control of my own life
I always follow my highest intuition
I take action on my intuition right now
I am always motivated and always get things done on time
I find it easy to motivate myself and get myself in the right state of mind
I always find the positive in everything

cat.name: Self-esteem
cat.aff: I feel great about myself and my life
I fully accept myself exactly the way I am right now
I am an unique human being and an unique expression of the universe
I am aware that my self-image is my own mental construction, and I can shape it in any way I want
I realize that the way others see me is purely a reflection of how I see myself
I am confident, positive, and friendly
I embrace life and all its amazing possibilities
I am confident and relaxed when talking to the opposite sex
I always stand up for myself
I am always aware that life is short and death is guaranteed for everyone, so I'm fully open to life and I know there's nothing to be afraid of

cat.name: Health
cat.aff: I am very interested in health
I am aware that improving my health will massively improve my life and happiness level over time
Working out even for 20 minutes today will greatly improve my whole day
I always focus on the feelings in my body throughout the day
I love healthy food
I exercise and take care of my body
I release all tension from my mind and body
I am in control of my stress levels
I take time each day to relieve my stress with stress-relieving techniques
My immune system is strong
I always make healthy choices

cat.name: Relationships
cat.aff: The purpose of relationships is to give
I communicate my wants and needs clearly
I am confident enough not to worry about my relationship
I know I deserve a happy, fulfilling, high-quality relationship
I believe in my ability to have a successful relationship
I always take into consideration the perspective of my partner
I am able to draw boundaries when needed
I am tuned in to the wants and needs of my partner
I am able to take space for myself when needed
I am always open to meeting new people

cat.name: Money
cat.aff: Making money comes easy as I create massive value for others
Opportunities to make money come to me naturally as I'm focusing on my life purpose
I see abundance in everything
I am grateful for what I already have
The best things in life are free
I always wait a few days before making that purchase to think thoroughly about it
A minimalistic lifestyle is actually the most fulfilling
I always think positively about money
My life is full of abundance

cat.name: Weight loss
cat.aff: I only eat healthy food
My food habits are healthy because I am living a rich, fulfilling life following my deepest purpose
I love living a healthy lifestyle
I always take care of my body
I am motivated to lose weight and become healthy
